values:
Hello 

Since no one is ever writing in this thing..I figure I will carry the torch and continue. 

Another week closer to the end of the year...although the Monday after Spring semester ends..I have to take a Maymester class. Statistics are gonna be no fun! And get this..I have to take my Stat final ON MY 21st BIRTHDAY!! How much does that suck?? This week went really well. A friend of mine came back to M-ville after a semester's absence..I have been winked at twice this week..I did much better than I expected on two assignments..and I bought 2 cool shirts that came in the mail today! It's the little things..right? 

I was supposed to go home this weekend to meet my first Wish Child for Make-A-Wish, but she is in the hospital. That means we will have to postpone our meeting with her family. I think that I am going to a movie tonight with some of my fav people. The majority of my weekend will be spent writing play #2, and starting my creative non-fiction piece. Joy..

I hope that all of you are doing well! 

Life is great!

:-)

Holy crap it's been a long time since I updated this stupid thing. I don't think that anyone writes in these livejournals anymore anyway. 

All I wanted to write was that I have been happy for the past week. I haven't felt happy in awhile..and it took a lot for me to notice it. I am better off now..and I'm free to do as I choose. It feels like this enormous weight has been lifted off my shoulders..and it feels great. I now see so many opportunities..when before there didn't seem to be many. I felt as if my choices in life had been limited..and now they seem boundless. I am looking forward to all the things I have coming up..my first Wish for Make-A-Wish..Camp this summer (I'm at teen camp!)..possible internship opportunities...and getting closer with some new people I have gotten to know this week. It's kind of sad to think that graduation is coming up soon..and so many of my friends here are seniors. They are all moving on (mostly to other states) and I'm stuck here. Hey..that just means that I get to go to those other states to go visit them!! Yay! ROADTRIP! I hope that all of you are doing well (those of you who still read this darn thing) and are as happy as I am now.

SMILE!

Well..its been awhile since I updated this thingy..so here goes!

Christmas break was great..nice to have the time off. Fall semester really took its toll on me..but I managed to get better grades than I thought..2 A's and 3 B's..not too shabby if you ask me! Zach and I celebrated our 6 month anniversary on Dec. 21. He took me ice skating!!! I had never been before and it was sooo much fun! For Christmas I got a digital camera..its sooo much fun to play with. I also got a Disney version of the board game Sorry from the twins! From Zach, I got two t-shirts, some nice perfume, a necklace and earrings, and a Sleeping Beauty watch! I got a few other things which were great too. 

I am excited to get back to work in the Spring..I have some great classes lined up. I'm taking Police Systems, Corrections, Intro to Creative Writing, American Lit, and Political Parties and Elections. Also, I go back to work on Tuesday at Housing. I have missed Miss Jenny, so I can't wait to see her! Other than that, not too much is going on. I have applied to be a counselor (permenately) at Camp Sunshine..which I'm worried about because they only have a limited number of spots available..I am hoping and praying that I get one of them. I miss that place..and the kids. That organization is so close to my heart, and I feel like it is my purpose in life to give back in such a way. So..wish me luck..I should find out in the next 3 months or so. I hope everyone is doing well..and I wish all of you love this new year! ALIAS STARTS ON WEDNESDAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

HAPPY 2005!!!  :-)

well..life is getting pretty crazy..in fact..its downright stessful..and guess what..its ALL school related!

I have 6 total projects/papers that have to be turned in between thanksgiving and finals week..im finished with half of it..now i only have the 3 major papers left! this is gonna be a fun two weeks!

going to zach's tonight for thanksgiving with his family on thursday..then me and zach are off to my papa's house in alabama for our thanksgiving..it looks like ill be doing mostly hw during this break though..

how do you like the new icon??? isn't it greeeaaat?? i just couldn't resist..it made me crack up!

oh..and get this..i got zach addicted to alias!! yessssssssssss! i knew he'd like the show..and he said it would be retarded...

oh well..that's my quickie update..i hope everyone has a wonderful thanksgiving holiday..i will miss seeing my friends..but i will see you guys sunday!

Instructions: Write ten statements to ten different people not telling who they are for.

1. I can't wait to spend the rest of my life with you..

2. I wish you were here and I miss you..

3. Thank you for being the man you are..

4. You deserve better than that..

5. You'll find your path in life, just be patient..

6. You could be so much better than what you have become..

7. I'm sorry I'm not who you thought I was..

8. There is something about you that I can't explain..

9. I think about you often and hope you are ok..

10. Thanks for believing in me and getting to know me..

Dear Lord,

Please help me get through all of the stuff that is going wrong in my life right now. Please help me deal with the pressure that is on my shoulders. Show me the way. I could REALLY use the help. Also, please let others be understanding of my stress and tiredness. Please just help me to do the best I can, and keep me focused. 

Amen

well..the semester will be ending before we know it..and the stress has hit big time!
I have 3 papers to write..no fun at all! I'm almost done with one of them..but no where close on the other 2. But hey..that's all I have left to do..so if I can just get motivated and focused..I'm all good. I have been feelling like crap lately..so that hasn't helped this situation at all. 
I have been missing Zach really bad..I did not see him this past weekend because I went home for my Dad's b-day..so this is the longest that we have ever been apart in almost 5 months..so..I miss him..

well..back to the 3 papers..
love to all..

Congratulations! You are Lynette Scavo, the
ex-career woman who traded the boardroom for
boredom, mixed with moments of sheer panic as
the mother of four unmanageable kids.

Which Desperate Housewife are you?
brought to you by Quizilla

im now getting into the habit of updating this thing once a week..just like zach i guess..oh well..

let's see..what shall i comment on..last week was great..go sox!!!! we are so gonna win the world series..get to watch the games all this week..speaking of the sox..my new icon is kinda cute..i hate ben afleck..but he likes the sox..so i guess he's ok..and they do look cute together..i will have to see if i like this..but i still love jennifer garner..she kicks booty!

this week is gonna be weird..i have nothing that i really have to do for hw..so naturally, this would be a great time to work on my multiple papers..the problem is that i'm not nearly motivated enough to work on them..oh well..

im in talks with this woman who i found through these caringbridge.com web sites (the same type of site as carter's) and she is starting her own organization for childhood cancer awareness..and i really want to help..bad..so i emailed her and she wants to sit down and talk about me helping her out..im excited..i feel like this is what im supposed to do with my life..help out this cause..im very passionate about it now..camp sunshine triggered that..but to me..one week a year is not nearly enough..im not satisfied..so i hope this is the right path..or will lead to it..
also..i was talking to abby (a girl i work with) and she told me that there was a class available here to take and become a substitute teacher..which i think is really neat..so i might look into that..because if im going to devote a lot of time to helping out cancer organiaztions..i dont know how much that will pay..if anything at all..so i need an income..and substitute teaching might be a cool way to do that..i can work on and off..and still be able to devote time to the cause that is so close to my heart..i dunno..these are just options that have arisen in the past week..so nothing is for sure..and wont be for awhile..

that's all i have for now..love to all
:-)

HAPPY    BIRTHDAY   JOSHELIN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I LOVES YOU!!

:-)

So..I had an eventful weekend..

I decided to go home to PTC on Thursday night to get some winter/cool weather clothes (and now its warm again..grr)..then I went on to Zach's house so we could see eachother for an extra night. Friday..Zach and I hung out most of the day..and then went to his friend Morgan's birthday at the bowling alley..I wasn't feeling too well so I took turns with Bethany (Zach's friend Matt's girlfriend)..Saturday..me, Zach, and his parents went up to Helen to Oktoberfest (yes..its spelled like that)..the weather was beautiful..but it was crowded..and there wasn't much to do except see the shops..so we left..but I did get a candy apple!! yum yum..Sunday..I was not in a good mood for reasons I will not go into..but we went to Six Flags for this cancer survivors/off-therepy day..so the tickets were free..but it was crowded so we couldn't really ride all the rides we wanted too..then my drive home was not a good one..was very upset and sad..won't go into why..but I really wanted my mommy..I wanted to talk to her so she could make it all better..but I can't talk to her..she cant tell me it's going to be alright..so I got bummed..I haven't been bummed in a LONG time..not like that..so that was odd..but I'm ok now..I think I'm too busy to be bummed..if that makes sense..anyways..got a long week ahead of me..as do most of you..so love to all..

bored at work..

i have been talking with miss jenny..doing a few small chores here and there..answering one call every 30mins or so..but im bored..im ready for the weekend..its gonna be packed with stuff to do..and the weather is supposed to be wonderful! if only the weekend could get here faster!

im thinking about dropping my poli sci minor and sticking with creative writing as my minor..it would take a little stress off me..although that means i took a bunch of classes that i didn't need to take..oh well..ill figure it out soon..

love to all

its been a long weekend..zach and i did nothing but lay around..last night i got sick..PMS..nasuea..no fun..didn't get to sleep until 3am..woke up today and still felt sick..felt like i was gonna pass out..but now im a little better..got a little bit of hw to do for tomorrow..then im gonna watch tv or clean out my mini refridgerator to sell to miss jenny..

im almost done with everyone's christmas gifts..all i have to do now is order them..but im not telling you what you got..you're gonna have to wait and see!!
;-)

love to all..hope everyone had a nice weekend!
all I have to say is that shopping for christmas presents is the funnest thing EVER!!!!!!

well..I'm at work..got most of my work stuff done..now I'm desperately trying to get my homework done. I have a poli sci test tomorrow..a reading quiz in history on friday..a history midterm on monday..and a national security policy paper due tuesday that counts as my midterm...sigh...oh well..it doesn't seem like I'm going to get a break anytime soon..also..I am looking at my schedule for the spring semester..and I'm hoping that it will be much easier than this semester..that is if it works out..but I can't sign up for classes until the end of October..I'm just really tired..and I wish I could just get a break from all of this CRAP..that's what it is..just crap..oh well..I love you Zach..I hope you're not too tired..I miss you very much..and I will see you in 1 1/2 days

Love to all!

well..this long week is almost over..and i am so tired..and all i wanna do is crawl in bed and never wake up..i have had so much hw to do..i just wanna scream..i had a quiz in national security policy on tues. (who knows how that went) and i had a test in law class today (got a sure A)..now all i have to do is finish this book for history class (we have a quiz on monday) and write the abstract for my history paper (due tomorrow)..the end is near..zach is coming this weekend..so that will be good..and i get my hair cut (finally!!) tomorrow and i get to get my money from home (yay!!)..so tomorrow will be a good day..CSI comes on tonight!! so that will be a nice break i can take..and im gonna sleep in this weekend..so don't come waking me up!! I just wanna say that im sorry to everyone who is not having the best week or two..and to anyone who is not happy..i hope your stuff gets worked out..and you feel better soon..have a great weekend everyone..or at least try to make the best of it if it can't be great!
love to all!

if your personality was what you look like what would your quote be? by ryuuichi
name
gender
age
your quote is:
Quiz created with MemeGen!

I have not really been able to express my feelings lately..and I don't think that these particular emotions can ever be expressed adequately..but here's my best attempt at it..

I know that in the grand scheme of things..I barely knew the kid..but Carter Martin touched my life more than I ever thought he could..I can not explain it..I guess you just have to know Carter..and it's not just Carter..it's his incredible family (Leigh Anne, Scott, and big bro Candler). These people just have a way of making you feel like you belong with them..you are instantly their friends and they offer you everything..leaving you to feel as if you owe them the same in return..and feeling the warmth of exceptance..and the presence of something great..not often felt on this earth..

Carter..though I only knew you a very short time..that was all I needed..at Camp I learned about this quiet natured boy with the "special" leg and helmet from Zach..I remember him telling me about him the day our kids arrived at Camp..and then the boating incident..I quickly learned that this "quiet" boy was anything but that! I remember Carter pouring water down Zach's shirt and yelling "get 'em!" at us girls..and yes..he did get us good..I was soaked from head to toe! I remember Carter in the pool..swimming all over the place and climbing all over poor Zach..I remember a kid who had so much enthusiasm and strength..I remember Carter dunking me 3 times in the dunking booth..and when it was Zach's turn to sit in the booth and Carter came up to throw the ball at the target..I remember everyone yelling "CARTER..CARTER..CARTER!"..I remember that grin..and that laugh..but it wasn't until after Camp that Zach told me that Carter was going to have it rough..he was having back pain which we found out later was due to new tumors growing in his little body..they said his chances weren't that great..I guess that's when it hit me..you see..I have never really experienced children with cancer until Camp..when I went through my treatment..I only saw adults..but it wasn't until meeting all these beautiful children fighting the same big, bad monster I fought, did I really understand what pediatric cancer really meant..a lot of these beautiful, smiling faces weren't going to live to grow up..although most will..but too many won't..and Carter did not make it..although he fought the good fight..but cancer did not win in this instance..Carter won because he did more with his 7 years, 9 months and 12 days than many can ever hope to do in an average lifetime..this boy has touched thousands because of his enormous faith in God..and his love for life on this earth..he did not take one day for granted..and appreciated everything small and insignificant..he was just a boy..but this boy touched my heart..and countless others..and we all miss him terribly..but now we all have this special angel named Carter who will watch over us until we see him again in that "glorious place" as he put it so adequately..I feel like I have not done this child justice..but I tired my best..even if most of what I have written has been just jumbled thoughts and memories..its what I feel right now..I guess I just hurt..and I miss that boy..I wish I got to know him better than I did..but I guess I should feel honored to know him at all..because so many won't get that priveledge..Carter, we love you little buddy..and I promise to try to live up to your example..I wll try my hardest not to let you down..catch ya later Cartmander!

Carter Samuel Martin (age 7 years, 9 months, and 12 days) died this afternoon..he fought his cancer so hard..but in the end..he was meant to be with God..he is an angel looking over us now..thank you for your prayers and thoughts..he deserved them all..now I ask that we all pray for the Martin family in this time..I will not post anything on my emotions with this until I can find the words to express them..because now there simply are none..goodnight

well..I'm at work and I have nothing to do except hw..but I guess that's a good thing..I had a good LONG weekend..let's recap..
Thursday: I got out of class at noonish..and then left for panama city at about 3:30 with Zach
Friday: enjoyed perfect weather at the beach and went to the pool..got a little burnt..then went out to eat..and then to see a movie..saw Paparazi (spelling?) and it was good..then went to play putt-putt with Zach..and I beat him (sorry baby..hehe)
Saturday: experienced even better weather than Friday..went to the pool first..then the beach..but Zach got stung by a jellyfish or some unknown creature..so that wasn't good..but then we went out to eat..and then went to Miracle Strip..it was too crowded and Zach and I were not feeling to great..so we left after riding the Log Floom and the Ferris Wheel..so we decided to go walking on the beach at about 9ish..we talked and sat there..it was really nice..I love the beach at night..its one of my favorite things..and the stars were so beautiful..it made me feel a lot better
Sunday: we woke up and packed up our stuff..then we went to the Pier and the water was sooo blue! we just wanted to see the water before we left..and neither one of us had ever been on the Pier..so that was fun..then we got in the car and drove back to Milledgeville..the weather actually got worse the farther north we went! we got back at about 6ish..then Zach and I went out to eat at Applebee's..it was good
Monday: stayed in bed ALL day! me and zach watched the CSI marathon on spike tv..i got him hooked on the show..haha! then he had to leave..and then I was sad (I still am)..
Tuesday: classes were cancelled thanks to hurricane francis..wahoo!! so I just stayed in and did some hw..and was bored to tears all day..

today..went to class and now I'm back to my old routine..

i miss you baby...and I love you so much..please hurry back to me..

Carter was baptized yesterday at home...how wonderful is that?
They say they are living day to day..I wish there was something that I could do to help them..so just continue to pray..and I ask that all of you continue the same..

I have not been able to put my feelings into words for most of the evening..or at least since I read Carter's web-page and discovered news that shattered my world..sweet little Carter will no longer receive chemo, radiation, or scans of any kind..for now on he will only be on pain medication..and he will spend "uninterrupted" time with his family..and don't they ever deserve these precious days..

The first thing that went through my mind as I read the web-page was horror..then anger..a burning anger that then caused tears to fall from my eyes..what I was I angry about? well..I was angry that God chose to save someone like me..and not a sweet boy who deserves a fair chance at life more than I ever will..then I got angry at myself for giving up on Carter..I know that he will hold on for as long as he can..this little boy doesn't back down from a challenge..he is too stubborn..he loves life too much..he is too effervescent..he is everything that we should all strive to be..but why is he more deserving at life than I am..why does he deserve a miracle more than I did? well..when I was diagnosed..I cursed God..I blamed him..I thought he was punishing me..I hated him..I lost my faith..I now have my faith back..but Carter and his family's faith has NEVER faultered..they have never expressed anger towards God..they are faithful even now..they continue to pray for a miracle and they have left everything up to God..that is an amazing testiment to faith..and I fear that I will never have as much faith as that little boy and his family do..Carter will even be baptized this Sunday..I wish I could see him..that would be a sight to see..

I ask that everyone please pray for sweet Carter..he needs a miracle..

let's never fight again..ok??

im sorry and i love you so much..please..let's not fight..i don't like it..

im taking a break from doing all my crap on sunday night to update this journal of mine..

this was a great weekend..on thursday evening zach came down to visit me..every night we had home-cooked dinners..it was nice..better than having to go out anywhere..in fact we spent our 2 month anniversary on sat. night cooking chicken parmesan, velveta, and we had strawberry short-cake for dessert! then we pretty much spent the entire weekend just chilling out..laying in bed watching movies..and playing board games with the gang..it really was a wonderful weekend..i love you zach..these past two months have felt like much longer..and im looking forward to many more months together! now i have to get back to all my chores/homework that i need to get done before tomorrow!
later!

hey...who knew that I would be BORED at work today..yeah..it is busy every once and awhile..but it only last for about 5-10 mins at a time..then its dead around here for about an hour..the phone hasn't even been ringing..so I thought I would post this..I have nothing better to do..I'm really hungry too..and that makes this even worse..because I have to work through lunch because there is no one else here..so my lunch is coming an hour late..grr..and I REALLY want to talk to Zach..really bad..but I can't call him from here..its not "professional"..woo hoo..as you can tell..I'm rambling..so I'll go now..later

well..what can i say..i just had the best week..and its been awhile since i last said that..i got to spend a week with zach..we spent more time together than we ever have..and it was wonderful..we got to just be ourselves..and it meant a lot..thank you baby for all you have done for me..i love you so much!

im in my new apartment..living with the twins..and ashley..our new roomie..who i have yet to meet but i hear wonderful things about her..she will be here tomorrow..and i cant wait to meet her..right now im trying to decorate my room..and just get this place under control..load #2 of laundry is in right now..and im trying to get all this crap out of the boxes! other than that..i could not be happier in my new living arangement!!

i am now a permanent employee of University Housing..i am an office aid..so for now on i will work mondays and wednesdays 10-5..so that $ will be helpful for groceries and stuff..it will allow me to save more $ for the future!

im in the process of quitting soccer..it has been the source of a lot of drama in the past 3 weeks or so..its just so hard to break ties with coaches like robert and michelle..and to leave behind something i never thought i would have the ability to do again..its difficult to explain why its so hard..but in a week it should be done..i have no choice..its just not do-able..i have school..work..and i need time to myself to do whatever i want to do..i just dont have time in my life to make soccer a priority..

thank you again for your prayers for carter..they are working more than ever..carter got to go to a FULL week of school this week..and he says he wants to have "perfect attendence" this year! so far..he's on the right track..AND he went this whole week without morphine!! our little buddy is not in the pain he has been in for the past month! so keep up those prayers..because they are working for this little angel..and he still needs these prayers to rid him of this damned cancer that has invaded his body..so again..thank you from the bottom of my heart!

much love to everyone..and good luck this week with classes..and moving in to your places!!

I just want to thank everyone who has been praying or thinking about Carter..because those thoughts and prayers are working..even though he suffered through some pretty massive pain this past weekend..this strong, brave, stubborn boy made it to his first day of school yesterday!! this was something he was determined not to miss..and he didn't have to! thank you to all of you..i can never thank you guys enough for caring for this special boy..he is worth it..and please continue to keep him in your thoughts and prayers..he still needs a miracle..

I love you Zach..can't wait to see you today..hopefully you will be helping me and the twins move into our apartment today!!

You're Kelly! You and Zach are meant to be
together. You come from a big family, and work
for the diner your friends like to hang out at
for extra money.

Which saved by the bell character are you? (with pics!!)
brought to you by Quizilla

I know that you guys have heard me talk about a little boy named Carter Martin..you have heard how sweet, and special he is..and how cancer has invaded his body..well now..for those of you who don't know..his cancer has spread even more now (as if there was any place left to spread..) ..he now has a tumor in the lining between his skull and brain..in his sinus area..spine..pevis..and right leg..there are other things going on with him such as extreme pain and numbness..but finding this out last night just crushed me..I feel so guilty for being alive..I do no deserve the wonderful things I have..I had it so easy compared to Carter..and to see him and his family suffer like this..and they remain steadfast in their faith for the Lord..and I'm sorry and ashamed to say that this was not the case for me..of course I pretended to remain faithful in God while I was facing the worst parts of my illness..but inside I was cold and callous..I had no faith in a God that would do such a thing to a human being..but now I understand that it was just part of his plan for me..I would not have the things I have without being sick..I would have never met Zach (or at least not as soon as I did, right baby?) and I never would have met Carter..things happen to us for a reason..but I'm finding it hard now to accept Carter's struggle..I get angry with God still..it doesn't last and it doesn't effect my faith in Him..but still..sometimes it just too much..why this beautiful little boy? and why let this happen to such a loving and caring family? they have endured so much..how much more should they be required to take?? why save me..I know that's wrong to say..but sometimes I can't help but wonder..I going to BEG all who read this to pray for Carter Martin and his family..please pray for a miracle..pray for peace for them..pray for strength for Carter..just pray..PLEASE!! He needs it desperately..thank you!

So once again I had a wonderful weekend with Zach! On Friday we babysat Carter and his older brother Candler..let's just say Carter is the easy one to look after! We insisted on not being paid..but his mom is just too sweet and threatened that we couldn't come back if we didn't accept the money..when Zach finally counted it out when we got home..we found out it was $80!! All I can say is that I was sick to my stomache..because I don't feel like I should be paid for spending time with the sweetest little boy..I wanted to do it and I know Zach did too..but we have decided to use that money to buy more gifts for Carter..things that we couldn't afford to buy him ourselves! On Saturday..we went to the pool..and I got some sun..which is great since I am pastey white! After that, Zach took me to my surprise..which was seeing "The Music Man" in the park in Ackworth..it was a great play..although..as Zach said to me..the acting could have been better..on Sunday we went to church..and it was great..their pastor is wonderful to listen to! Then we went to lunch at Steak and Shake! After that we went to the mall and I got a new purse!!! Also, Zach bought me this cute sign to go on my door..either in the apartment or in my room at his house..I also got some picture frames and a photo album for my camp pictures..so it was a jam packed weekend..looking forward to next weekend!! All I have to say is that I have the best boyfriend on the face of the earth and I love him SO SO much!!!
hey to my friends..I just wanted you guys to know that Zach has a livejournal now too..and his user name is buff_daddy5 ..he said he wouldn't mind if my friends saw it..so I thought I'd post it..

I am the one who should be feeling guilty..I have not had the time to adequately express my feelings about my boyfriend Zach..all I have mentioned about him adds up to a paragraph in this journal..so now I will write as much as I can before we go to dinner tonight..our 1 month anniversary..
I met Zach at Camp Sunshine..on our first night there..I knew I liked him..he was so sweet to everyone..and he just seemed so happy..and he showed me a lot of attention..which made me wonder if he liked me..but I assumed that a guy like that wouldn't be interested in me..and he is so hot! The next day he said he wanted to know if I was interested in going to a Braves game with him and some people after camp..I was thrilled and said that I'd love to..then I had even more hopes for something between us..but I remained unsure..afraid that I was imagining something more..we continued to do just about everything together because our cabins were paired for everything..and our meal tables were next to eachother..the boys in his cabin even called us "boyfriend and girlfriend" before anything happened..by Monday night..at the carnaval..we were dating..we continued to spend as much time together as we could..even spending rest periods and evenings together..then by the end of camp..we knew that there was no point in dating because we knew so much about eachother..so we were boyfriend and girlfriend..and I knew that I had deeper feelings for him then I could have ever imagined..some people might think I'm crazy..but I fell in love with him after a week..and the crazy thing is that he loves me too! Imagine that!! Even though we have only been together a month..it feels like much longer..and I have never said this to anyone but him (for fear of being called "crazy") but I'm convinced that there is no one else for me..I love him and want to be with him for the rest of my life..so I said it..think what you want..but we love eachother and I am the luckiest girl on the face of the earth..I have the love of a wonderful gentleman..who makes me feel beautiful..smart..and special..he makes me feel complete and whole..part of me is missing when I'm away from him..but now I have to end this to get ready to go to dinner with him to celebrate our anniversary..I love him..and I'm sorry that I didn't do you justice sooner baby..I'm sorry..I love you so much and miss you..

Ok..so my last post was a quickie..now I have the time to explain it..Carter Martin is a 7 year old boy who was in Zach's cabin at Camp Sunshine..he has had one leg removed and a portion of his skull removed due to bone cancer..but at camp he was so full of life..he is the most energetic..happy..caring little boy I have met in awhile..it was not until after camp that I found out that his chances are not too good..I had no idea..you would never know it..apparently he has been having terrible pain in his back..and he is back on chemo..on Sunday..Zach and I met him and his mother for lunch at the mall..it was the highlight of my weekend..Carter had made me and Zach presents.. we gave him this Georgia Tech sign to put on his bedroom door..we spent almost 3 hours with him..we took lots of pictures and it was just a blast..we even arranged to babysit Carter on Friday..then today..I go on his web-page..which is the web-site I listed in the previous post..and his mother posted in his journal that they have just learned that he has 3 new tumor growths..which is not good at all..in fact..they are saying that the primary goal right now is to manage his pain..hearing this crushed me..I don't know what to do right now..how could this happen to such a beautiful child? It is not fair..now I feel guilty for being successful with my treatment..I would rather trade places with Carter..let him take my place so he can live more of his life..he doesn't deserve this pain..or this illness..I ask that anyone who reads this will pray for this sweet boy..he needs all the help we can give him..if you don't pray..please think good thoughts for him..Please spare this child Lord..let him live..give him a miracle..

hey guys...please pray for this little boy..he needs it terribly..

www.caringbridge.com/ga/cartermartin
